name: Forestry
description: Gather wood from trees, process by-products such as resin or sap. Identify tree types, use appropriate tools, and practice sustainable harvesting. Access to high-quality timber, materials for woodworking, and potential knowledge of rare flora.

name: Weaponsmithing
description: Craft weapons from various metals, including swords, axes, and more. Learn metallurgy, forging techniques, and weapon design. Ability to create powerful and unique weapons, potential for special effects or enhancements.

name: Woodworking
description: Craft equipment and materials from raw wood, including weapons, tools and furniture. Master woodworking tools, understand wood properties, and practice precision. Create durable and aesthetically pleasing wooden items, potential for unique designs.

name: Armoursmithing
description: Craft armor from metals, providing protection in battle. Learn metalworking, armor design, and forging techniques. Create sturdy and effective armor sets with various resistances.

name: Leatherworking
description: Craft armor from animal skins, emphasizing flexibility and lightness. Learn tanning, stitching, and animal anatomy. Produce lightweight, agile armor sets with natural resistances.

name: Enchanting
description: Create consumable spell scrolls and imbue items with magical effects. Study magical theory, practice spellcasting, and understand enchantment rituals. Enhance weapons, armor, and accessories with magical properties.

name: Tailoring
description: Process plant materials and create armor from them, focusing on magical properties. Learn weaving techniques, understand magical fibers, and practice precision. Craft enchanted cloth armor with unique magical attributes.

name: Engineering
description: Create gadgets and electronics for various purposes. Study mechanics, electrical engineering, and inventiveness. Access to advanced technology, creation of unique devices.

name: Alchemy
description: Create potions from plant materials, providing various effects. Understand herb properties, practice potion brewing, and master potion recipes. Brew health, mana, and other beneficial potions.

name: Researching
description: Discover hidden properties, add gem slots, improve blueprint quality and unlock item component improvements. Conduct experiments, study ancient texts, and explore magical theories. Improve and customize equipment, unlocking hidden potentials.

name: Herbalism
description: Gather plants for alchemy, including rare and magical herbs. Recognize plants, understand ecosystems, and practice sustainable harvesting. Access to rare alchemical ingredients and increased potion potency.

name: Fishing
description: Gather fish for cooking, including rare and exotic species. Master various fishing techniques, understand aquatic ecosystems. Obtain unique ingredients for cooking, potentially discover valuable lost items.

name: Cooking
description: Cook various foods that provide bonuses when eaten. Learn culinary techniques, experiment with recipes, and understand nutritional properties. Prepare meals that grant temporary buffs or provide healing.

name: Jewelleler
description: Cut gems and create jewelry with magical properties. Master gem-cutting techniques, understand magical gem properties. Craft jewelry that enhances magical abilities or provides resistances.

name: Mining
description: Gather raw metals from deposits, including rare and precious ores. Use mining tools, identify mineral deposits, and practice sustainable extraction. Access to valuable metals, potential for rare gem discoveries.

name: Salvaging
description: Break down items for materials and process abandoned wreck and buildings in the world. Understand material composition, practice deconstruction techniques. Recover valuable resources from old equipment and structures.

name: Medicine
description: Create items that restore health, including potions and salves. Study herbal medicine, learn alchemical healing properties. Craft potent healing items, potentially cure ailments.

name: Mercantile
description: Buy and sell items, on the market and with NPCs. Understand market dynamics, practice negotiation skills. Access to better deals, potential discounts, and increased profits.

name: Lockpicking
description: Open locks, bypass security measures. Learn lock mechanisms, practice precision and stealth. Unlock hidden areas, gain access to valuable loot, and potentially disarm traps.

name: Fire
description: Associated with flames, heat, combustion, and destruction

name: Air
description: Associated with gases, wind, atmosphere, and breath

name: Water
description: Associated with liquid, oceans, rivers, rain, and fluidity

name: Arcane

name: Blood
description: Associated with life force, sacrifice, vitality, and ancestral power

name: Divine

name: Earth

name: Ice

name: Electricity

name: Death

name: Life

name: Light

name: Darkness

name: Time

name: Space
description: Associated with the cosmos, stars, galaxies, and astral planes

name: Spirit
description: Associated with ethereal entities, souls, ghosts, and spiritual energy

name: Chaos

name: Order
description: Associated with structure, organization, logic, and stability

name: Sound

name: Metal
description: Associated with minerals, alloys, craftsmanship, and industrialization

name: Wood
description: Associated with trees, forests, growth, and natural materials

name: Shadow
description: Associated with darkness, stealth, concealment, and manipulation

name: Dream
description: Associated with the subconscious mind, illusions, and alternate realities

name: Psychic
description: Associated with mental abilities, telepathy, telekinesis, and perception

name: Fate
description: Associated with destiny, prophecy, fortune, and predestination

name: Dream
description: Associated with dreams, imagination, creativity, and inspiration

name: Celestial

name: Infernal

name: Void
description: Associated with emptiness, nothingness, oblivion, and the absence of existence
